author: Paulo Coelho
text: Relax. You can’t save someone from themselves

author: Ray Dalio
text: Pain + Reflection = Progress

author: Tochukwu
text: If you lack discipline, you'll become the big talking mediocre

author: Margaret Thatcher
text: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he’d only had good intentions; he had money, too

author: Abraham Lincoln
text: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well

author: Helen Keller
text: Your success and happiness lie in you

author: Ming-Dao Deng
text: Life is a constant series of opportunities

author: Richard Bach
text: A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow

author: Carla Gordon
text: If someone in your life talked to you the way you talk to yourself, you would have left them long ago

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts

author: Bo Bennett
text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are

author: Vidal Sassoon
text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary

author: Albert Schweitzer
text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful

author: Henry David Thoreau
text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it

author: Zig Ziglar
text: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm

author: Colin R. Davis
text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same
Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference

author: Maya Angelou
text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it

author: Richard Branson
text: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming

author: Sheryl Sandberg
text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on

author: Warren Buffett
text: It's far better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price

author: Oprah Winfrey
text: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.

author: Mary Kay Ash
text: Aerodynamically, the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know it, so it goes on flying anyway

author: Mark Cuban
text: It doesn't matter how many times you fail. You only have to be right once, and then everyone can tell you that you are an overnight success

author: Sara Blakely
text: It's important to be willing to make mistakes. The worst thing that can happen is you become memorable

author: Meg Whitman
text: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical

author: Ginni Rometty
text: Growth and comfort do not coexist

author: John Lennon
text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

author: Abraham Lincoln
text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

author: Helen Keller
text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

author: Charles R. Swindoll
text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.

author: Sarah Louise Delany
text: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

author: Sholom Aleichem
text: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.

author: Oliver Goldsmith
text: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.

author: Victor Hugo
text: Life is a flower of which love is the honey.

author: Albert Einstein
text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Tony Robbins
text: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.

author: Oscar Wilde
text: Life is too important to be taken seriously.

author: Grandma Moses
text: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
